channel.title: GRPC on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog
channel.description: Recent content in GRPC on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog

item.title: Generate js files with protoc for GRPC web on Windows
item.description: Download protoc Download protoc-gen-grpc-web Add to system environment variable PATH the path to protoc-gen-grpc-web for example : C:\protoc-gen-grpc-web\ Then run on powershell or windows command the following command : protoc --proto_path=proto --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:proto --grpc-web_out=import_style=commonjs,mode=grpcwebtext:proto pathToProto/myProto.proto
